statements: UPDATE EventInvitations SET invitation_status='Accepted' WHERE event_id=1001;

UPDATE invitations SET status = 'Confirmed' WHERE event_id = 101;

UPDATE interactions SET interaction_type='registration' WHERE event_id=1 AND participant_id=2;

UPDATE interactions SET interaction_type='Check-In', interaction_date='2022-09-20 10:30:00' WHERE attendee_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND event_id='234e5678-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
